title: Vertical
creator_credit: David Hall and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: Both a simple catalogue of verticals and a series of visual paradoxes exploring illusions of straightness and squareness and the notion of frame. A stimulus film showing recurrence of geometrics in nature. No dialogue.
